title: scream107
author: scream107
content: Hi all, dear users!  I cant find good bet365 account seller, and have a lot of scammers only.Now i think that i can offer use your account and increese your balance. And then 50/50 profit.Please help me do better, what do you think is good for this method?1) Need only login+pass of your account. You can change it in any time if you want. I cant steel your account.2) You dont need to do anything. I will do all.3) We will have 50/50 of profit.4) When we have x3 your balance - you will withdraw and send me half of profit.You can ask me or offer all what you want. Lets discuss it here.30 may 2022 start balance (27 594 Indian rupii)https://ibb.co/ssSKVkZ8 june 2022 finish balance on same acc (129 672 Indian rupii)https://ibb.co/84bQBXCI am not scammer. I just try to find good bet365 accs seller, and when i was scammed few times - i think that this topic is better way to use my method.ONLY for bet365 account owner!!!

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: when i read your post i immediately ran to google to find out if in your country they accept gambling or not and i found out that in your country they do not accept gambling. So far this is something very problematic, however you can search for someone casino that is not banning people from your country to play and who accept using VPN. you don't just need to be using this risky method that you are proposing here on the forum, look for other casinos that are suitable for your situation and that you won't break their TOS.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: This is bullshit. You will have full acess of the account regardless if you don't have the email sinceyou have full control of the owner balance. I don't have idea about bet365 account but there's might be a tip feature that will let you transfer fund to your own account. I can give you my bet365 but you should be the one who will put balance on it since you are the one who will gamble. Your only problem is for not having an account to use for gambling so I guess you already have a lot of money as capital for your own game.

comments.author: scream107
comments.body: Quote from: Slow death on June 18, 2022, 04:35:58 PMwhen i read your post i immediately ran to google to find out if in your country they accept gambling or not and i found out that in your country they do not accept gambling. So far this is something very problematic, however you can search for someone casino that is not banning people from your country to play and who accept using VPN. you don't just need to be using this risky method that you are proposing here on the forum, look for other casinos that are suitable for your situation and that you won't break their TOS.i can increese balance fast only in bet365.Thank you for advice!

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: I don't think that anyone will give you account for the purpose that you're going to do and also if someone decide to give you the account, who tells you that he's going to pay you for your service?Then, this is a clear violation of TOS and could cause the ban of account. Go and register an account by yourself if your country allow that, and play by yourself without use the others account, it is illegal.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: scream107 on June 18, 2022, 03:57:57 PMI cant find good bet365 account seller, and have a lot of scammers only.Now i think that i can offer use your account and increese your balance. And then 50/50 profit.Please help me do better, what do you think is good for this method?1) Need only login+pass of your account. You can change it in any time if you want. I cant steel your account.2) You dont need to do anything. I will do all.3) We will have 50/50 of profit.4) When we have x3 your balance - you will withdraw and send me half of profit.You can ask me or offer all what you want. Lets discuss it here.No one is a fool here. You want to help someone to gamble, not only that, you also need the login details of the person. Which means you can be able to withdraw the money the person will transfer into the account because it is still the person that will transfer into the account, that will only lead to a scam that only a fool will fall for. Also if the account is used for illegal activity, who is going to be arrested or taken responsible? You know that it is not you but the owner of the bet365 account. I hope no one will fall fool of this.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: I have a solution for you. Find a way to be able to create an account on bet365 and then deposit some crypto yourself instead of asking someone to borrow their account with balance. That way, you don't have to split the profit since you are the account owner and you don't have to worry about getting scammed. You said you can beat bet 365 so, do it yourself using your own money then I am sure you will triple your balance and have a great profit. Does that sound good?.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: scream107 on June 18, 2022, 03:57:57 PMNow i think that i can offer use your account and increese your balance. And then 50/50 profit.Please help me do better, what do you think is good for this method?1) Need only login+pass of your account. You can change it in any time if you want. I cant steel your account.2) You dont need to do anything. I will do all.3) We will have 50/50 of profit.4) When we have x3 your balance - you will withdraw and send me half of profit.You can ask me or offer all what you want. Lets discuss it here.lol, this is too good to be true. there have been a lot of offers similar to this in the past, I've always told whoever is interested to be cautious. anyway, things like this are too risky for either the account owner to yours. no offense to you OP but there is a high chance that this would end up in a scam.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Scammer or not it’s still too risky to let someone gamble using your account, most probably they are just trying to get your account information and you might soon be a victim of a scam. I don’t think someone will really sell their account because this is not how it works and if you really want to gamble OP, you can just create your account on your own, there’s a lot of crypto gambling site to play with so don’t limit yourself with only one option.

comments.author: BitcoinAccepted
comments.body: Aside from the fact that this may be a scam (I'm not judging that) I don't think you can beat any bookmaker. Or you must have very valuable information and such valuable information will never be posted on a forum. The only way to win fairly at Bet365 is to gamble, otherwise it won't work. You could try surebets, but then you'll be out of the site in a few days that's for sure.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Why not create your own account and beat the site using your own account? I don’t see any urgency to play on this site, to the point that you need to get someone’s account just to gamble. If you are restricted on this site don’t push yourself to play, do look for alternatives because the reason why you can’t find a seller is that, no one will let their account being used by anyone, this could be a scam so better to be careful.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: Slow death on June 18, 2022, 04:35:58 PMwhen i read your post i immediately ran to google to find out if in your country they accept gambling or not and i found out that in your country they do not accept gambling. So far this is something very problematic, however you can search for someone casino that is not banning people from your country to play and who accept using VPN. you don't just need to be using this risky method that you are proposing here on the forum, look for other casinos that are suitable for your situation and that you won't break their TOS.^This is definitely right.Plus another factor is that switching account from different IP address which possible will lead to banning account. Reading ToS is definitely a good decision that you will probably consider and the proposal that offer by the OP is quite risky foe both of them even though we are not judging him as a scam. Find a gambling casino that you can create account OP that not has restricted in your country.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Have your own account and why it has to be someone else's account for you to gamble? You just can't do that and tell them that you'll split the money in 50/50. And who's money you're going to gamble? The owner's as well?Come on, no one will trust you on this one and if you want to gamble. Just take yourself accountable for your own action and just use your own resources and account so that you're good as what you want to be and you'll solely have the money 100% if you win and if you lose, you don't have to blame anyone.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Show us proof that you are good at what you're doing we don't know if the images you provide us are legit, it's not recommended that you let others use your account from a restricted country if they caught you doing this, you will be in trouble, they have all your access and log in information and besides you don't know the real identity of the one using your account he could find a way to transfer his balance to his wallet, so better careful on dealing on this kind of offer.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Beating a gambling site? That’s a big word for me and seriously if someone can really beat gambling site, why do you think they need to spread the word and ask for someone’s account? I see this offer as a red flag better not to deal with this kind of offer, which is too good to be true. Scam or not better to be safe than to regret later on.

So, what's the point?

comments.author: STT
comments.body: This is the wrong forum section, by caveat emptor its fine if you have some great idea to involve people in trusting a profit will occur but that would come under the marketplace services available part of the forum where people try to sell alot of different things good or bad.       'Im not a scammer honest'   great but any personal reputation and services selling would be elsewhere pretty sure.Try the marketplace: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: STT on June 18, 2022, 10:09:17 PMThis is the wrong forum section, by caveat emptor its fine if you have some great idea to involve people in trusting a profit will occur but that would come under the marketplace services available part of the forum where people try to sell alot of different things good or bad.       'Im not a scammer honest'   great but any personal reputation and selling would be elsewhere pretty sure.Try the marketplace: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0This should be in the marketplace and I don't recommend to anybody to deal with a newbie account its not that newbie are not worth our trust but when it comes to something like this, a newbie account with no reputation should not be entrusted with our gambling account, they claimed he has been scammed in the past he tried to show us that he is an honest person but that won't do be careful dealing with offer like this, we have a lot of similar situations like this in the past.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: scream107 on June 18, 2022, 05:00:29 PMQuote from: Slow death on June 18, 2022, 04:35:58 PMwhen i read your post i immediately ran to google to find out if in your country they accept gambling or not and i found out that in your country they do not accept gambling. So far this is something very problematic, however you can search for someone casino that is not banning people from your country to play and who accept using VPN. you don't just need to be using this risky method that you are proposing here on the forum, look for other casinos that are suitable for your situation and that you won't break their TOS.i can increese balance fast only in bet365.Thank you for advice!  Why don’t you use your money and account to do it so?Isn’t the site available in your country?Moreover no one will trust you on their money and bet on your calls.Also no one will send you id pass of their account filled with balance.And what’s so special with bet365 ?If they found that you are cheating with them, then they gonna surely kick you out from their site by confiscating your balance.So anyone who is planning to help OP, Process with extreme caution, if you love your money .

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: scream107 on June 18, 2022, 05:00:29 PMi can increese balance fast only in bet365.Thank you for advice!  Bullshit.In the unlikely event that you had a winning casino strategy, it would not depend on which casino you play at.Quote from: scream107 on June 18, 2022, 03:57:57 PM30 may 2022 start balance (27 594 Indian rupii)8 june 2022 finish balance on same acc (129 672 Indian rupii)That proves nothing.Quote from: Nrcewker on June 19, 2022, 02:52:26 AMSo anyone who is planning to help OP, Process with extreme caution, if you love your money .It seems to me that this is an understatement. It would be better to say:Don't be foolish enough to fall into the OP's trap.
